column4: hey im using ubutnu hardy heron 8,4 and my network using mikrotik os router but in windows i have intrnet  ubuntu no intrnet i try avry thing but nothing ubuntu still no intrnet
i dont have intrnet on my ubuntu box.

hmm  well when I  upgraded the other computer from 8.04,  to  8.10,  I lost the ethernet connection,  I did a clean install of 8.10  no ethernet,  turns out it woudn't work on the Live CD either.
